pageTitle: Public events for December 11, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, December 11, 2015:

Québec City

11:30 a.m. – The Prime Minister meets with the Premier of Quebec, Philippe Couillard, in Québec City.

Honoré-Mercier Building Lobby
835 René-Lévesque Boulevard
Québec City, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.
  • Media should contact 418-643-5321 for accreditation.

Québec City

2:00 p.m. – The Prime Minister holds a joint media availability with the Premier of Quebec, Philippe Couillard.

Office of the Premier
Honoré-Mercier Building
835 René-Lévesque Boulevard
Québec City, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.
  • Media should contact 418-643-5321 for accreditation.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
